about_the_game:
You’re the fugitive criminal, convicted for smuggling overly addictive sex toys. You manage to flee, taking advantage of a prison riot, and you are lucky enough to find the rusty old spaceship nearby, the bad thing is that it falls into disrepair after just one hyperjump.

Now you have to put all your energy into fixing it, if you want to reach the destination, of course. What’s the destination? Right before you’ve ended up in jail you’ve managed to hide a large, no, HUGE shipment of contraband on a distant planet - if you find it you’re going to be richer than ever before!

But this isn't just an escape story - it's a thrilling adventure full of unexpected encounters, edgy situations and opportunities. Gather resources in open space, craft instruments to fix the ship or to spy on girls, trade, deal with everyday issues like space junk hitting your ship and complete quests!

Throughout the journey you’ll meet many charismatic and unique heroines ready to join, each of whom brings something special to the crew. You will get to know sexy milfs - each with their own story, secrets and motives.You will get to know them better and explore their minds and bodies as you travel all together looking for shelter and wealth.

Get on your ship, get to know your crew, explore the vast space and find your lost treasure to become rich, free and surrounded with hot milfs!

Features:
  • Hot adult content - unlock the 18+ scenes by managing relationships with your crewmates and crafting different tools.
  • Impressive visual style - high-quality, stylized 2D graphics and animation designed to satisfy even the pickiest enjoyer!
  • Exciting gameplay mechanics - gathering, craft, voyeur elements, random events and quests wouldn’t leave you a chance to get bored!
  • Various characters - all hot, milfs or not! Each with their unique personality and backstory.
  • Enticing retrofuturistic setting - explore the galaxy in an entourage stylized universe.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity. The game graphically depicts sex. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Milfy Way: Space Orgasm 🪐🔞

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Milfy Way: Space Orgasm 🪐🔞 is a wild mix between a dating sim, voyeur sim, survival with crafting and a hot adult road movie in a retrofuturistic sci-fi setting! Flee the prison, fix your ship, explore the galaxy, seduce the girls and find the hidden treasure that’ll make you rich!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
